Artful Agenda really is the best of both worlds!

I have finally found "planner peace" with Artful Agenda. I love paper planners and all that goes with them, but I never use them consistently. Being able to access AA at work and home in my browser and on my phone on the go has been a game-changer. It seems like they constantly rolling out new features as well. And the price is at least $20 cheaper than the last customized planner I invested in.

As a bullet journal user I have been wanting a digital version that would sync with my personal electronic calendar and low and behold Artful Agenda! This is the best of both worlds. Able to be customizable and update as the mood strikes you. Places to take notes. A spot to log water intake, what more could you ask for. This is exactly what I needed. Anxiously awaiting the offline feature!

Never thought I'd go digital for a planner. I was a diehard pencil to paper kind of gal. However, the thing was never with me when I needed it. I'm not carrying it around with me like I do my phone. I'm a home health speech therapist and when COVID hit, I needed to minimize the amount of things I brought into my patients' homes which started my search for the convenience of a digital planner with all the customization of a paper planner. It has absolutely everything I want: - month, week, and day views with hourly breakdown (week and day) - repeating tasks so I don't have to write the same thing over and over - unlimited notes/lists - syncs across devices. I have it on my phone and computer. Best of all, I have it on my work tablet. No more accidently double booking speech sessions! I'm also a hippie and don't think this gets enough love for it's ecofriendly features. - it's all digital = no trash going to landfill - easy color coding = no more multiple plastic pens or washi tape (less clutter in the office/supply bag) - no more physical stickers - multiple covers you can change anytime And it's just so stinking cute!

I love this app. It's the only planner I've been able to keep up with. The list tab is a game changer for me in the digital planner world. The developers seem fairly responsive to feature requests. Being able to edit my calendars and check off tasks as well as the ability to edit the water tracker and add grids to the lists are the only "complaints" I would have, but they are minor issues with easy work-arounds for me.

It was great until it wasn't. It started having technical issues. I couldn't use the widget. It started to glitch and spasm. Had high hopes for this planner. I'm a little disappointed üòû . Update...I really like the app. They reach out to me and fix the bug. The app is working great!

I've always needed lists, alarms, and reminders, so planners have been a must for me. The big problem is that my paper planner is not always with me, or readily available. I now decided to give Artful Agenda a try, and I'm loving it! I love that I still get to personalize it with stickers, different fonts, and all the colors. I love the integrated alarms. I love that it keeps me organized, and that it's always with me on the go! I'm loving this digital planner!

I give 3 stars for now because it's still really glitchy. It's all lovely thus far, but with being an agenda it's a must to run smoothly. My time slots will not go where they are supposed to? I've tried trying my own glitch to see if it would work like setting completely different times and then setting back and tried manually moving the schedule to it's slot but it moves my other schedules around. I am very excited about this app, I've been on the hunt for one for ages. Please fix! Thank you!‚ù§

Been using this app for about 6 months with a 1 year subscription. It really is the closest app to a real life paper planner. I especially love all the extra customizable sections to make monthly and weekly goals, meal plans, and to-do lists. The customizable fonts and covers are also colorful and modern looking. Tech support is also pretty responsive!

I love this app! You can seemlessly synchronize unlimited Google/Outlook/Apple calendars across all my devices, with recurring events. You can customize with free fonts, covers & stickers, and purchase more if wanted (at a very reasonable cost). You can also add an unlimited number of lists to keep track of everything, and assign each item to specific days. There's so much more to love, and more amazing features are being added for added beauty and functionality.

Game Changer! I switched from a paper planner because it was just too cumbersome, and I could never refer back to something I had written on it. With AA, I can search on a key word to find my notes. I use it across 3 platforms (Android phone, iPad and MS Outlook on a Windows laptop) and it synchronizes seamlessly. I also sync to 4 different calendars so that everything is in one place. The stickers are helpful on the month view to see what sort of activity is planned. Love it!

I have always been a paper planner girl, but now that I've tried Artful Agenda I will never go back! I love the custom covers, adorable stickers and the ability to link multiple calendars together in one place! It's extremely functional and I am obsessed with the fact that I can access it straight from my phone (and computer, too!). No more anxiety about losing my paper planner...loving this beautiful, digital way to organize!

I have so many positive words on this app. Originally downloaded on iOS (along with 10 other apps to see which one works best for me and my planning needs). This one, well, won. The interface, the stickers, the ability to snooze todos, and sync with multiple calendars. It's a dream. The only thing I wished was to have the ability to view it on my android. Lo and behold, there's an android version and it's perfect.

The BEST bullet journal style planner! My favorite aspect is when I add an event to any of my calendars, it automatically syncs across platforms AND puts the event in the corresponding monthly, weekly, and daily views. If I don't accomplish a task on any given day, it's rolled over the next! Did I mention you can put this on your phone, desktop and/or access via a browser?! Totally recommend this app to EVERYONE!
Overall, very helpful!

This is the most comprehensive and user friendly digital planner I've tried. I no longer have to worry about transferring information, repetitive writing, or figuring out what I'm going to do with all of these beautiful paper planners I've used and can't throw away. It also costs a fraction of what I was paying for the 3 planners/notebooks it replaced. They're customer service is awesome! If you want functionality it doesn't provide, just request it!

Omgosh! You HAVE to try this. I almost didn't do it because it wasn't free, but it's worth EVERY penny for me. It is super easy to use and figure out. I can easily see every appointment/event on the monthly view tab, which is hard to find. Notifications are great. The "lists" are unending, goodbye to my separate notes apps!! And some beautiful stickers to make seeing and remembering your event quick and at a glance. I can't say enough. Everything I have been looking for! Thank you!
Love this app. All my favorite parts of a paper planner with the benefits of my multiple online calendar management!

I have used paper planners and when I tried this one, it clicked with me. It is easy to use it syncs up with all of my email accounts smoothly. I can look things up in a moment whether I'm on my phone on my tablet or my computer. I've had this for a year and a half now, and will keep it!
Great app!

I've been a paper planner girl for years, and I don't say that casually. My planner is my vade mecum, my bible. Artful Agenda (Plus) is everything I've been looking for in a digital planner. It's cute, it has a great habit tracker, it's just structured enough, love the month/week/day option, and the lists option gives you lots of brainstorming room. My FAVORITE thing is setting up recurring tasks and having tasks roll over automatically if they aren't completed! It even has stickers!
Great app!
I never leave reviews - but this Planner has changed my life!
I love the app

LOVE THIS!! It's cross platform so I can access it from my computer or phone! It has beautiful fonts, stickers & covers to choose from. The VERY BEST feature for me is that I can create notes in each section for monthly/weekly/daily. If I know something's coming up on a certain day, I can just go create a note under that future day to remind myself even if it's 6+ months away! I used to have to rely on tons of alarms all the time (adhd problems lol) but now I use this daily to keep me on track.
Love the functionality and beauty of this app!
Love this app! So many features all in one app. Lists, Habit tracker and day, week, Month views.
Best agenda app ever! I love paper planners but I need the digital reminders to pop up on my calendar. This is the best of both worlds!

I love this app. It looks pretty and it keeps me organized. I only use the calendar, tasks and lists features of this app, so I am not sure I have tapped into it's full power. I do have it sync with my personal google calendar, that way I can see everything at once. Really so far it has been good and yeah I would recommend

I have been using Artful for a little over 2 years now. I find it so user friendly and intuitive that I have now also convinced two others to give it a try as well (who have stated they enjoy it). 10/10

I love this digital planner. I usually prefer paper. But it's not convenient because I don't always have it with me. And I don't like the boring display of Google calendars. I love the fun customization you can have with this. The fun cover patterns and the stickers. I've been using this app for about 3 years and LOVE it!

Having a visually pleasing format that integrates with Google & behaves like a paper planner but available digitally is exactly what I needed to keep me organized. Being available as an app on my phone & tablet and accessible via the web (always synced), I never have an excuse of not having my planner handy. I like the ease of switching up the cover, colors & font themes to suit the month or season. I love the habit tracker & being able to upload my own stickers. Can we upload covers soon? üíúA|A
I use it on my phone, tablet and pc. Love it!
Love it
Very cute and easy to use..
I absolutely love this planner!! It's everything I need; a digital planner with a physical paper feel. It's genius! And I love the addition of the Habit Tracker.
Great app! So helpful I can't tell you how many times a day I look at the widget.

I have tried several digital planners but always went back to my paper ones because it was "prettier" with stickers and color coding. Loving Artful Agenda. Using it everyday, thinking about putting my 2024 paper planner away
I love this app! I love having everything in one place. It really helps me to be more efficient. And the stickers make it fun to personalize.
Responsive, creative, supportive Facebook group.

Edit: Support has remedied the situation already. While the app was not a fit for my needs, customer support is excellent. I signed up for a 7 day free trial today and was immediately charged full price. I canceled it immediately after. Hoping i receive a refund as I was supposed to have the option of canceling if the app did not meet my expectations, and it did not.
Love my pretty planner! I go back and forth between the web version and the android app seamlessly and love it.
Love this app. My favorite feature is that my priority task rolls over to the next day when not completed.

I never thought I would use a digital planner, much less love one. AA is the best planner I've ever used. It's easy to learn, great access on all my devices, no extra or hidden fees. AA a great organization system. Quick and easy access to calendars, notes, and connects with all my online calendars. It's a game changer for this busy employee/teacher/student!

I was very skeptical that I'd like switching to a digital planner, having always been a planner book devotee, but I absolutely love Artful Agenda! I tried several different programs first that didn't suit me, were too complicated, etc, but I loved this one immediately.
Wish there was a subscription tracker intergration
Love this planner!
Love it!
Been using on apple and now just installed on an android phone. Love this journal more then any I've tried... And I've tried a lot.
beautiful calendar app. intuitive and easy to use

Long time subscriber :D Subscribed for the year membership back in 2019 and I honestly can't imagine my life without it. It is aesthetically pleasing, practical and useful without being too overwhelming, and integrated well with other organizational platforms (Outlook calendar, Google calendar, etc.). While I am looking forward to the upcoming updates, I'm happy with this app.
Amazing!!

I've had Artful Agenda for about 6 years now! I love this digital calendar! It's pretty, it's fun and it keeps me organized as a busy homeschool mom of six kids, an entrepreneur and minister of the gospel! It links to Google calendar as well, which is brilliant and there's many cool sticker features to jazz up your daily schedule. It's great on both app and desktop. Don't know what I'd do without my Artful Agenda!

I've been a customer since nearly the beginning and I won't say it's perfect but I won't go back to paper planners ever again, even though I adore them. This app is simply the best of both worlds! They continue to upgrade the options and user experience. I love the customization I can do with it √†nd how it dovetails nicely with Google Calendar.

Amazing app! Artful Agenda is the planner of your dreams. It's decorative and fun for every season or holiday, has so many great features, and truly helps keep you organized! I searched for quite some time for the perfect planner app, and I didn't have to look any further after finding Artful Agenda! I have used it now for 2 years and they continue to improve and update. Highly recommend!

Love, Love, Love this!! I finally have a way to combine my need for digital convenience with my desire to still have a paper planner. The integration between my computer and my phone has saved my bacon more than once! As kind of a side note, the ability to change up the covers to suit my ADHD brain is fantastic! It is slightly more difficult to create appointments and make changes, but it's definitely not a deterrant at all. I give this 2 thumbs up!!

As someone with ADHD, I use my phone calendar religiously to remember important things, but I also ALWAYS buy a paper calendar that I will only use for 2 weeks before I stop using it for the rest of the year. Instead of impulse buying a paper planner and trying to coordinate between both this one and that one, I use this. I LOVE this, the way it syncs and how you can customize it. I can't wait to see more customization options in the future. I can also change covers whenever I want! Bonus.

I am a new user, discovering all of the features, really coming to like the product. For the cost of an annual paper calendar, the digital planner is really fantastic . I really like that the developers listen to what features we would like and make adjustments so the AA continues to grow with our needs. The support team is very responsive. The features are well thought out, and the calendar pages are visually beautiful. This is the most paper like, functioning virtual product I have found.

I'm only about a week in and I LOVE Artful Agenda. For the past several years I have used a physical planner consistently, but of course still had to manage Outlook and Google calendars this is literally the best of both worlds. I have it up all day while I'm working, take notes into it, add to my task lists and assign them out to different days. It is everything I hoped it would be. I'm looking forward to discovering more features.

Already Falling in Love with this app. I have been looking for a digital alternative to my planner but didn't want to lose the decorative function of my hardcopy and this one has stickers and is really visually pleasing. I am new to AA but I think it is going to be the one I use. I have found it to be easy to use and reliable, no crashing or freezing.

I have purchased so many planners in my life and have bought all of the fancy pens, stencils and stickers. I always have great intentions of planning and being more organized but the planners always end up forgotten and unused in no time at all. I am only a couple days into my free trial of Artful Agenda and LOVE IT! I can customize it and make it look pretty but able to sink it to my gmail and thus have it on all of my devices. Now I never have to worry about leaving home without it.

I have been a paper planner girl for a VERY long time. I am really enjoying Artful Agenda. I love being able to personalize pages along with integrating multiple calendars. I am still new to the app, and I look forward to learning more about it. Update 8/24/21 still loving the app over a boring old Google calendar. Keep up the good work, looking forward to more updates.

Great planner app that is constantly evolving and getting better. It takes any calendar - google, outlook, etc, and makes it pretty, and fun so that you actually want to look it and use it. LOVE the lists and how they integrate as tasks to check off on days you assign that they're due. What's most impressive though is that the company is always listening to the users, fixing bugs, offering help so it can be used to it's full potential, and making improvements and updates based on our suggestions

Love planners but hate to waste paper? Can't choose between daily or weekly layouts? Then this digital planner is for you! All your events and to-dos automatically move between the daily, weekly and month views. You can track meals, water intake and a custom field. It's also got a handy list section for taking notes and syncs with your existing virtual calendars. Best of all, it's accessible on the internet and as an app, so you'll never be without it. Plus, you can personalize the design.

I've tried so many things- created my own systems, used planners, bullet journals, calenders, etc. This one combines the best of everything from all of the mentioned above tools. You can make to do lists, goals, put stickers, track your water/meals, and have a day/week/month overview (and you get a little inspirational quote in multiple areas). The look of the agenda is also gorgeous. I absolutely love this app, I have already recommended it to friends, and I'm excited to continue using it. :)

LOVE this app!!!! I was having trouble managing my daily agenda, but Artful Agenda has really helped me to stay focused on tasks each day. It has tons of great features and the developers are extremely responsive to the customers. Artful Agenda is beautiful and so easy to use. You can sync all your calendars in one place, create limitless tasks and lists, schedule tasks and reminders, use daily, weekly, and monthly views, and make it fun with tons of covers and stickers. Very highly recommended!

Love the background options and that it has a really well functioning widget. I wish it had the ability to have multiple widgets at a time (so I could have one for calendar and one for a to-do list). The to-do list is a wee bit clunky to enter items, but you get used to it. I wish there were different stickers available, or couldnintergeate/import other stickers. This is definitely the best "digital" bullet-journal I have come across.

This virtual planner app is great! I really like that it looks like a paper planner. And some might be wary because it's not free but I figured I usually end up spending 3-4 times more on paper planners and supplies throughout the year. The widgets on my phone have been easy to set up & use and there is good support if you have any issues or just questions on how to find or do something.
It has been a great experience coming from paper to digital. I like all the custom sessions and the things they are adding. That makes it feel like a paper journal.

I am loving this app! I have it installed on my Android phone, iPad and PC. They all look and work the same. Sometimes Apple versions are a little different. They all sync together with not problems. I have all my weekly activities color-coded. I put in my one-time appointments with reminders. I have my to-do lists also that rollover undone tasks to the next day. It is easy to edit appointments and tasks. I emailed suggestions for stickers and received a response right away. Hopefully they can add them soon. Wonderful app that is fun and easy to use.

My planner journey has been evolving for over a decade. As I added a more fast paced role in my job and adding in 2 kids and their schedules to the mix I needed something that could move to digital. And while I've found amazing resources for lists and to do and separately for calendars I was having such a hard time finding something that sync'd all my existing calendars and had my to do list in with it. Artful Agenda brings it all together. Worth every penny (and less than I was spending on paper planners and notebooks to try and do the same thing).

I love this digital planner. It is simple to use, nice to look at and gives me just enough to keep me on track each day. The best part is that it links to my Google calendar so I'm not inputting events in multiple places and it works across my devices. I love using it on my tablet, but appreciate having it at my fingertips, on my phone. Well done! I look forward to seeing other nice touches that you add over time.

Artful Agenda is a wonderful electronic planner. I used to use a paper planner bc Google calendar just wasn't enough. AA fills the gap. Not only do you get day, week, and month views, there are areas you can customize with goals, to do lists, meals, or whatever you need to track. Also, stickers and interchangeable covers help make the planner your own!

OMG, I'm in love!!! The personalization and "pretty" factor are the only things I love & miss about physical planners (they're worthless to me, with my ADHD), and this has that and more! I can combine my work Outlook & personal Google calendars easily, choose which calendars in each, set multiple alarms, see different views, put my lists and other notes for the day/week/month, set tasks to recurring (though I also use Asana so probably won't use this much), & so much more!! This is EVERYTHING.

This has been the best planner to date with daily, weekly and monthly views of several calendars. I especially enjoy the ability to have list and be able to check off completed tasks as well as not be limited to the length of the list or the quantity of lists! Thanks for the great application! Ps ... will there be, in the near future, the ability to add pictures and tables to my lists? I'd love to be able to see before and after pictures of my renovation ideas and hobbies. Please and thanks!!

This is the best solution for me. I have ADHD and while I love pretty planners, every time I buy one, I lose it within two months and stop using it. This digital solution uses my Google calendar where I already put my important things so I can get reminders and turns it into a planner that I can decorate with digital stickers and washi, change the cover, color coordinate etc. without having to worry about losing it. There are places for daily to dos and other lists. Seriously life changing!

I have always been a paper calendar lover because I can use colored pens and stickers to enhance and create a memorable calendar. With this app it's better, brighter, cleaner and so much more. It goes with me everywhere without having to carry something extra. I can access through my phone or laptop and it can sync with multiple calendars keeping my work and personal appointments well organized. Thank you for creating the ultimate paper calendar in digital format.

So I love this app- I think it's perfect for what I needed, at the time. Sadly my job changed and so did my need for a calendar/planner. Artful Agenda was still great but I found myself no longer using the stickers or really having time to add information to it. I canceled my subscription- they were super easy to work with. I still recommend this app to girls when asked - ‚ù§‚ù§ I love and miss Artful agenda. When my job changes again I'll be back.

I just got this app 2-3 days ago but I'm already OBSESSED. I've bought many paper planners, made my own planners with check boxes & daily schedules (I even saved one as a picture in my notes app so I could write on it digitally), & I've tried all sorts of planner/calendar apps. Let me tell you, this one has blown them all away. My favorite feature is being able to go into the lists tab & assign tasks to other lists. One request? A lists widget so I can check things off from my home screen.

This seems amazing & everything I want! I like to plan out & schedule tasks I want to accomplish during a specific week without having to schedule it to any specific day that week. Like a weekly to-do list where I can drag and drop the weekly tasks I want to work on that day. This is the only app I could find that even has a weekly note section/to-do list!! Sadly, I cannot justify the price right now and will be sticking to my paper planner, but when I go digital, this will be my app of choice!

Update: Had a rocky start but now im loving this planner. Still learning all the fun things it has like Stickers!!! Colorful themes, syncs with Google calendar. I use lists like crazy when i shop or need to know what to focus on for the week or day. Support always gets right back to me. Ive tried other planners and calendars this one by far requires less video watching.

I live by my calendar and lists on a daily basis. I manage 5 schedules and Google calendar wasn't cutting it! I found artful agenda and absolutely *love* the way I can organize my calendar the way I want it to look and feel. The ability to add color, tasks, lists, meal planning, and sync everything together has proven this was a worthwhile purchase for me! I appreciate how the company listens to users and makes changes and enhancements based on the customers' needs! Highly reccomend!

Instantly hooked! I have tried so many other digital planners, but this one is my favorite, even just after a couple days. Very user friendly, fun, syncs with my Google calendar and across platforms, and many of the sections are customizable. I don't like tracking meals, so I simply renamed the section to "exercise", and now the planner better suits my needs. I'm constantly finding new little features to love, and simply cannot fit them all here. I'm a bit of a planner nerd, and I love this!!

I have been waiting for forever for a customizable digital planner that does what this one does. The backgrounds are gorgeous & there's lots of variety. The features are EXACTLY what I was looking for in a digital planner. I love the daily sections & lists. I love that you can share calendars and sync to multiple different ones. I have only been using it for about a month & have already recommended it to friends & family!

Artful Agenda is the most functional and versatile calendar/planner I have ever used. I used paper planners for many years, but I got tired of carrying them around, so a few years ago I transitioned to a digital calendar combined with a variety of "to do" apps and note taking apps. Artful Agenda integrates all of those functions into one neat and user-friendly package that can sync multiple calendars across multiple platforms and devices. It is well worth the modest annual subscription price.

I've used artful agenda for almost a year now and I absolutely love it! It has made keeping my appointments and bills for the entire family easy to keep track of. I know I don't always take advantage of all of the features, I'm horrible at consistently meal planning, but I have this app synced over all of my electronics. It's like having a physical planner but I don't have to lug around another item, but I always have my phone on me. I just recommended this app to a good friend of mine. Sheüíì's!

Beautiful!! I love this app!! I can sync all my calendars in one place, choose the colors for different calendars, and it looks and acts like a planner. I've tried a lot of digital planner apps, and this is the first one to actually do all the things I want. So over the moon about this app!!
Good

I really enjoyed the trial. I love the look and ease of use on the desktop verson. Just getting used to the mobile version. I hope I can print this out and add to my discbound organizer too.. I'm new to using planners. It can be a little glitchy but, I enjoyed using it.

I am enjoying this app and love many things about it. The only thing I would add is to be able to write in the daily tab without adding a whole event so I can just jot down my timeline of more minuet things.
I really do love the app. I just wish we could do a few more things. Maybe let us add our own tabs.
Love this and it gives me enough to almost go completely paperless. I just need an integrated habit tracker and would LOVE a stylus option as well.
At first I was overwhelmed with everything and how to do it, but my friend helped me, and I'm glad she did. I love this calander.
The app has been super easy to use and is very pretty. It's a step up from Google Calendar in terms of features and I'm looking forward to seeing what else they do with it.
Sweet little digital planner ... I love the stickers, cover selections and sync between mobile and desktop versions. My only disappointment is limited Widgets options for android users
Good just need financial planner page please.
Wonderful Digi Calendar. I love the optional layouts. Yes, there is a fee, with it wasn't but oh well. Ive had other calendars and they weren't as nice.
I am only a few weeks into using AA, but I am feeling very positive. It feels simple to learn for a "new to app planners" user. The support through the FB page is prompt and helpful and supportive.

I have not been using this app long enough to give it 5 stars, but so far I am REALLY LIKING IT. I appreciate the simplicity. It's not overwhelming or overly technical which I love. I'll add more to my review as I continue using the app to organize my personal and work life. Thank you.
Great visual calendar. Great Lists function. An improvement I would like to see is the ability to use the stickers on the lists.
Calendar options & syncing is great. I wish there were better list options - like a daily to-do that would attach to the Calendar date.
I'm still new to the app, but so far I'm happy! I love digital planning, but miss the beauty found in paper planners. This app marries digital and beauty wonderfully!
It would be fantastic if this was compatible with "Hey Google" I can open the app by saying hey Google open artful agenda but it doesn't do anything else. I was trying to add an item to a list
I wish there was a dark feature, the option for events to be highlighted with their specific color not the font, and much smaller text on the widget.
So far I love the layout and being able to have monthly/ Weekly goals. The stickers are pretty plain but the ease of using this app outweigh the stickers.

I do not spend time writing reviews however, I love using my artful aganda it what I needed in my life and it has MOST of the features that I need in my day-to-day life. I am writing this view in hopes to bring awareness and bring attached too their daily quotes. It would be wonderful to read from people of color, LGBTQIA2S+ and our disability community during each celebrated months. Representation matters.
No Pen Support. I liked this app... the ease of use for the calendar is great. I didn't realize that there is no pen support. Canceled my trial. May check it out again later.

Best calendar app I've used! Constantly improving & adding features. Still missing a few important ones (make lists private/only for 1 user & not others, repeat/rollover tasks is awesome but sometimes does not work correctly, edit a task in Artfully if pulled through from another calendar, etc.). At times a bit clunky, but overall it's extremely helpful & incredibly beautiful! Its fun stickers and gorgeous backgrounds always make me smile, too! (Thanks for all your hard work, Artfully team!)
Love that you can change the cover

Very pretty and girly. I am still not sure if the price is worth it. I still use the Google calendar sometimes, and I don't miss this one, but for sure, there are more ways to keep my days and activities organized in a VERY CUTE WAY. I like it very much!!

This app brings together everything I wanted in an agenda. I can easily track my goals & to do list as well as see my calendar. The website is better than the app. I have to clear the app from my recent apps in order for it to respond when I try to mark a task as complete. Customer service solved this problem. I also don't love getting notifications from this app for calendar events, and so still in put data in Google Calendar, but it syncs perfectly with this app. The cost is appropriate.
At first I was overwhelmed with everything and how to do it, but my friend helped me, and I'm glad she did. I love this calander.

I love the app! It's great and syncs well with my other calendars. The only thing I wish they had was to choose different weekly and daily layouts. It's the best planner I have used and always end up abandoning my paper planners. Haven't done that with this one!

Being a full time employee, full time grad student, and a mom, my schedule is crazy. This planner has been a game changer for me. I can color coordinate and use it on multiple devices! It's great! I just wish it more security. So like a bank app or something you need a pin or fingerprint to access it.
Wish I could make notes on days on calender itself without adding an event. I recommend this app just for the list feature alone. Use it daily.

Thus far, enjoying the app, cross-device use, connectivity, and ease in adding the multiple personal and business accounts I monitor. One product suggestion which was submitted to tech support, have Samsung Galaxy Tab 6Lite and the pen to text does not work. Will this be a future feature.

I love how it syncs with Google for my husband. I'm using the meal planner and grocery lists which I enjoy as well. I'm still waiting and hoping for additional tracking like fitness and budget. Why artful agenda are you now charging an upgrade fee for those of us that committed and have stuck with you? This is super disappointing. As my original review shows I was asking for these things. When you said it was coming I purchased. Now I have to pay again not right not right at all!

The calendar is really cute. It is very aesthetically pleasing. I like that you can add stickers and link Google Calendar. There is a section to add Monthly, Weekly, and Daily Goals. As well as customized sections on the Daily view.

I am very new...about a week! I love that i can see AP on all devices (even an OLD ipad!). It is taking me along time to get it set up, to figure out how i want to use it. I am SO greatful for this app!!! i have spent too much money buying other digital planner apps that i was unable to figure out how to use. I am so happy with Artful Agenda Plus! i looks like something accomplished! the Admins are super friendly, the communnity is very friendly and cheerful!!! I am quite happy i bought this
This is a great app I just wish they would offer a monthly subscription also
Love this app .I would have given it 5 stars if it had a option to pay monthly instead of just yearly.

I love the idea of this app. This is exactly the kind of planner app that I would like. I love the concept of a paper planner format with google calendar integration. However, there are still too many bugs to be functional. And there is not pen support that would make this perfect with my Samsung tablet.

Very good calendar/planner. I love paper planners and this has come the closest to replicating that feel with the functionality and portability of a digital planner. Syncs quickly and easily with Google Calendars, which we use so keep track of home vs. work vs. extra schedules, activities, meeting, etc. I would like to see the ability to change the time for an event notification as well as more comprehensive customability for recurring events.
Good just need financial planner page please.
This is a great app I just wish they would offer a monthly subscription also

Wonderful app all around. Very pretty and girly. I am still not sure if the price is worth it. I still use the Google calendar sometimes, and I don't miss this one, but for sure, there are more ways to keep my days and activities organized in a VERY CUTE WAY. I like it very much!!

I really enjoyed the trial. I love the look and ease of use on the desktop verson. Just getting used to the mobile version. I hope I can print this out and add to my discbound organizer too.. I'm new to using planners. It can be a little glitchy but, I enjoyed using it.

Great so far. I recommend having the lists saved offline since I went to the grocery store & there was no signal so my list didn't load. That was inconvenient. I use it for priority tasks for the day, meal plans and different colors & stickers.

Best digital planner I've discovered so far! Its apparent simplicity belies its power and functionality. The lists feature is great especially the ease of transferring checklist tasks to a date. I hope it continues to improve and add new features.

I do not spend time writing reviews however, I love using my artful aganda it what I needed in my life and it has MOST of the features that I need in my day-to-day life. Wish I could make notes on days on calender itself without adding an event. I recommend this app just for the list feature alone. Use it daily.

Beautiful design and feels much like using a paper planner in terms of customisation. Love this app .I would have given it 5 stars if it had a option to pay monthly instead of just yearly.

Gorgeous app! I love most of it - though there are a few areas that still need a bit of tweaking, and app development. - Like the fact that you cannot set a timezone to the full app, but have to edit every single time you input an event - and then the alarms go off in the wrong time zone. - you cannot sync more than 1 Google calendar, and it is quite a bother to try to un-sync if you use the wrong one. - cannot add stickers to notes. Love the customisation though!

I love it! I was hesitant at first to get a membership but is so worth it. It helps keep track of school, work, projects, and all. Is been a great way for me to establish a routine. Pros: visually appealing, easy enough to understand and use, very similar to no frills yet aesthetic paper planning/journaling Cons: sometimes freezes/lags while inputing data, not as customizable as other digital planning apps (can only make to-do lists, no habit tracker, can't list items using other bullets such as "reminder", etc.)

Great digital planner! I wanted a combination of something that would sync with google calendar but still allow for cute customization and this is it! Overall I really really LOVE this digital planner. I do see room for opportunities but that's with anything. Things that would make it 5 stars would be: 1. Putting tasks on the daily view and allowing task reminders, alot of people miss tasks because you specifically have to look to remember to do it. 2. Beautiful planner. I'm a paper and pen person, but this is really close. I love that fact it's cross platform. I currently have it on Ipad, android phone and pc it's fantastic. The stickers and colors are fun. I'm still learning all the features. I definitely recommend it.

Love, love, love this app and the way it blends the experience of a gorgeous paper planner with a digital planner. Thank you!!

I have not been using this app long enough to give it 5 stars, but so far I am REALLY LIKING IT. I appreciate the simplicity. It's not overwhelming or overly technical which I love. I'll add more to my review as I continue using the app to organize my personal and work life. Thank you.

Aesthetically pleasing though it didn't bring across the colours alreadybused in my google calendar which isnt too much of a big deal Only thing so far is I would rather have a 24hr clock option and that is rather annoying

This is one of the apps that I've used for the longest time. It has a lot of flexibility and features. But I think the UI needs to be updated for a more modern look. Also, qukckly swiping through month view used to be very precise but not anymore.
absolutely best planner! I use it for work and home life. Woth 4 kids and a career, it's a life saver!

I tried alot of free planners/agendas and nothing worked just right. I use my google calendar alot but felt I needed something more. I decided to go through the free trial and instantly I loved it. The price was a major concern for me as I am in Australia and the exchange rate put this close to $80. But I convinced myself after dividing it by the month. The biggest thing I love about this planner is that it syncs so beautifully with google and other devices.

I was using the free version for a long time before upgrading and had no issues with it. Upgraded mostly to support devs. It's been so long since I upgraded I don't remember exactly what changed with the paid version so I can't say wether it was worth it feature wise. Tagging locations has been a huge help since maps takes forever to open on my older phone. Being able to jump straight to directions from the widget on my home screen has been a life saver.

Hands down, my new favorite calendar app. And Ive used just about all. I'm one of those with multiple Google and Outlook calendars, and needed a way to not only see multiple calendars, but easily add and sync in one interface. The template for appointments that dont recur at a regular intervals is a huge time saver. Color coding choices, drag and drop and the options for each entry are awesome. Multiple reminder times are a huge value. There's a ton more, premium version is worth the investment!

This app is great! I've been using the paid version for several years since I've found the Google and Outlook apps to be limited in handling calendars from other systems. I especially like the way you can click on any combination of tabs at the bottom of the screen to view different calendars, with tab color coding that I can match to the font color of the appointments.

This app has a lot of great function and I do enjoy using it. Only one thing is an issue. When syncing tasks across my two android devices there seems to be a lack of information transfered. To be specific, a task will sync to my other device but the time of the reminder and other details do not sync. It will simply show up on the other device as an "all day" task. Aside from that, this is a great app.

Having used this app since the first version that this version replaced, there's literally nothing I can think of to add to this calendar app. It's fast, robust, configurable and dependable. I have it connected to three Gmail calendar accounts and have never had a problem. The price is fair and there's no goofing around with having to pay again if you get a new phone. Just reinstall and off you go. And the widget is so we'll done I basically never have to open the app.

Using this paid calendar for more than a year. It does a great job at organizing multiple calendars. Lots of options. Occasionally it wouldn't sync with a Google calendar I had. The resolution is to have the Google calendar app installed (the blue 31 icon), but no need to use it. I've had the same issues with other calendars so I don't think it's specifically a problem with Business Calendar. Anyway, this calendar is great!

This is the best Calendar app ever. I don't remember where I heard of it (some youtube tech channel), but I have been using it for years, and have had no issues with it. I love the customizability, and the widgets are perfect. It allows my to change font sizes, colors, add tasks, add in multiple calendars, etc. By far the best app.

This is the best calendar on the planet. That seems like an exaggeration of course but I recently switched to iPhone and they don't have this calendar available and my life is now in shambles. You don't realize it's the littlest things that matter, like font size, or how many days you view at once (I prefer 3 week view), or even the shade of the color of the calendar or text. Business Calendar Pro has this all perfect. Perfect model of efficiency. You don't know what you've got until it's gone.

I've been using this app for years to manage multiple Google calendars. The app is highly customizable, gives much better control over reminders than the Google Calendar app, and can also access / manage tasks from Google accounts as well. It takes some time to get the settings exactly the way you want them, but the app functionality is well worth the time spent setting it up. Also, the few times I have contacted customer service, they have always been quick to reply and fix issues.

Been a great app for a couple of years now but lately having problems, all the recurring (yearly) entries are coming up more than a dozen times on the same day - it's like the software is picking up all the calendar events for the upcoming years and placing all those entries on the same date... serious bug.  -UPDATE: The programmers contacted me quickly - I have looked at the Samsung calendar on the phone and it works perfectly‚Ä¶ no duplication of future recurring events. I deleted and reinstalled the app with no success. - thanks.  Update: the calendar team contacted me and helped me work through my issue - fantastic support !

Update 1/2022. Still great! Calendaring needs have changed between needing access to Outlook and tasks. Still meets all my needs. Best feature is being able to easily turn on and off specific calendars so I can easily see personal only or include work, tasks, other family calendars Original: Used for years. it stays easy and intuitive to use. Quite useful for easy access to multiple calendars.

Been using this app or the one before it for years now. It's a great app that has only improved with time. Loving the new colors. Only thing I could wish for is a more customizable print page, but it's rare that I need to print my calendar. It's one of the few where I paid for the upgrade, mostly out of appreciation for a well done, well supported app. Not in any way affiliated with the app, nor did I receive anything for this review.

I've been using it for the past 4 (now 6) years. I *really* wish there was a PC version so I could manage tasks at work, without looking like I was on my phone all the time. It has features I can't find, a small memory foot print, and integrated so well. It's better than any PC app, paid or free, w/ a mobile sync app.

I have tried a number of Android calendar apps, and this is the first one I've found that has all the features and affordances I've looked for, centering on both easily and rapidly creating events, and moving/rescheduling events and contiguous blocks of events. It's not perfect, but it's pretty awesome. Two thumbs way up!

I'm using this to budget and I don't like Google's calendar. I got my entire months expenses mapped out and then had to delete an entry. Turns out you have to pay for that option. But I don't even mind. Loving the UI and how easy it is to use. Beautiful and helpful app. Entirely worth the one time price of 7.99$! Yep, it's not a subscription which is rare these days and I appreciate that too.

I am extremely happy with this calendar, I have been using it for a few years now. it integrates seemlessly from google calendar, rarely glitches. There is more customization available in this app than any other calendar app that i know of (I'm picky with what i want my calendar to look like and do). i It even has more customization than i need. It works well right away with minimal setup, but during the first few weeks and months you will want to customize. It takes time to learn all features

Amazingly useful. I've been using Business Calendar for years. It has some indispensable features that Google Calendar app just can't do. For example, being able to push selection of events in time by specified number of days, and have them all adjust relative to their original date. Brilliant! Or drag and drop for events. Google finally added this to their app maybe a couple of years ago, and it still doesn't work as well as the one in Business Cal. Business Cal allows you to adjust the length of events via intuitive sliding bars, where as GCal's events have to be adjusted via standard numerical inputs. Business Calendar has a ton of other useful features that are well worth the price of the app.

The best feature is the customizable widget. Better than any other calendar, let's me match it to my phone perfectly. The UX is good but could use a bit of simplification. Also wish that when creating a calendar event, if I need to switch to another app to find information, it should retain my in progress event creation as a draft. Instead i have to start over.

Great calendar app, constantly improving but without ruining it or making the kind of changes that force you to relearn everything. its readily solid. A long time ago I paid for premium, so I'm not sure what's included in the free version. but at the time it was also very good. Never have any problems with this calendar app interfacing with Google either. it's just really solid. Love all the color options. Very customizable. Recommend.

Have used this for years, still love it. Favorite feature is the ability to quickly see/hide different calendars with the buttons on the month view. Top features: pop up details on the monthly view, Google maps location link, Emojis, repeat event customization, search calendar. Very customizable. tons of features. Works great cross platform and with subscribed calendars to pull in our many family activities. I use 2 widgets together .. 1) daily list view 2)monthly view.

I love this app. I keep the month calendar widget on my home screen at all times. Really efficient app and easy to learn. Every now and then it has a problem loading, but that is rare. Definitely get the paid version for no ads. It also opens up some other options for customization. It's well worth it considering a planner at a store will probably cost twice as much (or more) and only be good for one year. Edit: still using it

Much easier to set multiple reminders because it remembers your past custom times. The Improvement that I would love to see is allowing the user to set multiple reminders at the same time without having to select them one at a time. there is nothing in the upgrade that I would use, otherwise, I would certainly pay a fee so they could keep this handy little program that has tiny little features that make it easier to use then all the others. for me anyway.

Best calendar I've had!!! I bought the upgraded version and I love it! I have tried out MANY different calendars through out the year and this has been by far the best I have ever used. It is customizable and easy to use. I can copy events to multiple days, delete multiple things at ones and the widgets they have shows me everything I need it to. It even has a task list that doesn't have to clutter up the month view. And if you have multiple calendars you can easily select what 1s u want to see.

I uninstalled üëâand reinstalledüëà the BC app about a week ago while reorganizing my phone to help prepare for the school year. After reinstalling the app, the widget hasn't come back. BC is pretty good when the the widget is functional and operational but not having it lowkey defeats the purpose. Please respond, will be happy to raise review for a prompt and helpful answer that helps me get the widget up again. Thank you. üëâEdit:üëà To get the widget up, I just pressed and held home screen.

Ever in love with Business Calendar 2! It's configuration settings are of sublime finesse. For example, you can move events in 5 minute increments or even 1 minute increments. It's especially useful when moving events, as it's better than other options do on both desktop and mobile applications. Would utmost recommend to those seek a power-calendar app!

The Best Calendar App that joins outlook, Google and device calendars in one view. You can toggle calendars on or off. Move calendar events. The syncing is more reliable and quicker on the app. I can see my work outlook and then my personal Google calendar. I can add events to any calendar. Reminders can be customized. You can create templates appointments for any calendar. Change colors. Customize the look of the month, week view. The widget has many viewing settings. User over 5 years.

Extensive customizing options are sure to make this just how you want. My eyesight isnt what it used to be, so being able to pick senior friendly UI options is my first criteria for any app. Now having so many options, there are a few that are a little awkward to figure out. Big problem is you cant export & restore all the preferences you spent so much time setting up. So on my next phone upgrade, I'll probably try another app. There's no way I will waste my time to manually transfer my prefs.

I've tried other calendars, and I just love the layout. If only the widget layout can be changed when first opened. But it shows everything I need very easily. I can share my calendar with other people. I can change the colors. Another recommendation is to gain more colors for the appointments. :) Overall, super happy. Will not be choosing another calendar!

Finally after years if trying! I've tried a number of calendar apps and this is the best buy far. I wanted to be able to scroll the calendar one week at a time, so I could see the next few weeks- this one does it well. Displays several calendars at the same time clearly, option of color bars or details... so many features that make sense. Almost a year later, I still love this calendar and I've told a number of friends about it. Every once in a while I discover another nice feature- well done!

This calendar application is fantastic and it is very easy to use. The best thing about it is that you can set multiple events and reminders. It's great that it has up to 5 reminders that you can set, for an event that you've made. There's also a custom setting for setting reminders to any specific time of your choosing. I'm also glad that it doesn't have autocorrect. There are convenient weekly monthly and yearly views to choose from. Great calendar application! I highly recommended it!

ƒ∞ncredible utility. Perfect for people with ADHD who need a time structure for their college/job. Lets you visualize everything you have to do with blocks of time. Helps with everything from planning studying to workout sessions, it's really a game changer. The app is convenient and intuitive. There is a premium version, which is useful enough that it's worth upgrading to if you're busy and need it, but it's also very usable without, for which ƒ∞ give high praise to the developers.

It's a calendar app. The job is pretty straightforward, but it does it very well, quickly, and in a nice interface. Specific items: syncing with Tasks is great. Syncing with other to-do apps like TickTick would be dreamy, but that's asking a bit much. Being able to set defaults for making new events is good. The color scheme is nice and not all blinding shades like many apps, and I love how customizable it is. I haven't used event "Groups" but it looks like a great feature. TLDR great app

Very nice calendar to keep track of my schedule. I really like this one and use it instead of Samsung's. The only things I would change is: I use it in the monthly view, but once I add an appt, it doesn't go back to month view. Also, I wish I could see more description of the appt in the monthly view. It only shows the first few words, then cuz off. Regardless, I love the customization and will gladly continue using this great planner!!

As an old PalmOS user, I have looked great and wide for something that integrates calendar, address book, phone, to do list etc. This app is the closest I've found and is my go to calender app. I would take off 1/2 star off if Google play would let me sure to the way phone numbers are handled. The software dials the numbers in the linked contact's address instead of the phone number. There is a work around but it takes multiple screen taps.

I've been using this app for years now and I love it. The widget is perfect for checking off little tasks/due dates that you might otherwise forget about. I upgraded to the pro version, which allows you to have repeating tasks that you can check off once a week, once a month, the third Saturday of every month, etc. It can sync with your email and automatically add in flights/important dates from your calendar. I can't even tell you how much this app has improved the organization in my life

Update: there was some issue with Android and Google calendar syncing which was fixed by contacting Google. Now the only problem I have is that one of my recurring work meetings does not show up. I'm guessing it's still an Android issue. I installed the app (a few times) but it crashes the moment I give it permission to my calendar. Any thoughts on what might be happening? I was hoping to use it instead of my Google calendar.
Great app with all the needed features
Got things done

Calendar works just fine. Working with tasks and to do lists is sometimes confusing. UPDATE. This app continues to be improved, with a good balance between options and ease of use. No hesitation in a full endorsement.
I have been using this app for several years on multiple devices and can't do without it.
Nice app....works well. I'm still using this app.
Last review I did was 2016. I've used this app for 8 years and still love it
superb calendar. the repeating reminders work like a charm. the voice input is reliable, the flexibility is outstanding. Been using it for 4 + years and can't say enough good things about it

When setting up multiple calendars for different types of scheduling work, volunteer work and time with the family, it so much easier to share the individual calendars with those that need to know about those schedules. Though, don't need to see your entire calendar. It makes checking availability easier, from your desktop or your smartphones. Recommended!
Love it. Easy to setup my schedule on it
Does what I need
Good app that allows attachments and more options than outlook.
I love this app that helps me easy to make my schedules and keep me on point.

My favorite app. This is the best app I've ever used!!! It just keeps getting better and better. It's like the app reads my mind and anticipates what I want to do. The longer/more I use it, the better it gets at almost anticipating what I want/need to do next. Especially, now with my new Windows 11 laptop, it's even more convenient and helpful + printing is easier. MW
Love this app!
Has been the best calendar app for many years. However the app contains: 21 trackers 34 permissions

Useful. I like the layout flexibility and widgets, but mainly use it because of the ability to set up new calendar entry templates. For instance, I automatically include invites to my business and wife's calendars to share awareness of my personal schedule, and this saves time vs manually adding the info to every appointment. I've used this product for many years... Probably more than a decade, and have purchased the paid version. Well worth the investment for me.
Been using this app daily for almost 8 years - enough said. üôÇ

3/29/2023 I still use this calendar, it meets my needs and have no reason to change! I really enjoy this calendar app. I've tried many and I've stayed with this. I haven't tried the paid version (pro), which seems to have some good options (just don't want to pay for yet another app to get full benefits). The unpaid version has everything you need. (Update: I've paid for the Pro version because I really like this app. I like the added benefits of the Pro version).

I'm not organized & lose everything but my phone. I went ahead and bit the bullet and purchased the pro version it was $8 or $9. I've used it for 3 days but I'm thrilled. I just recently started a new position in my company that comes w/ more paperwork, stress, & responsibility. I wasn't sure how I was going to keep track of it all. I spent a day inputting all my tasks personal & professional. I can toggle b/t lists easy & my stress has decreased dramatically. Buy the pro version & play with it

I have used only this app for my MULTIPLE calendars for as long as I can remember. I've gone through over a decade of being a college student, a theatrical professional managing simultaneous projects for several theaters, working several jobs at the same time, and keeping multiple personal calendars - this is the only app I've found that could keep up. I have three of this app's widgets on my home screens. If you're a calendar superuser, this app is absolutely essential.

Excellent calendar app with great flexibility in setting up reminders, allowing for several different notifications for each calendar entry. Allows for including addresses in the calendar entry so that you can just tap on the address and have a navigational map pop up. Easy to use, very reliable, incredibly flexible in allowing choice in which entries might be shared and which are private.

Excellent calendar and productivity app. Granular, intuitive, and comprehensive sertings. Use the schedule with integrated task view most often and appreciate the ability to customize virtually every aspect of their appearance. Using app as main calendar and scheduler since 2015 and have no reason or need to switch due to its comprehensive settings.

I have been using this app for years now. I have tried other calendar apps on Android and IOS and this is by far my favorite apps. It may not have a bubbly interface like other calendars but the features are great, especially if you have multiple calendars to manage. The features that get added are helpful and useful as well. Thank you for a great app.

Great app. My focus is mainly on the calendar, and all the features for it allow complicated and repeating appointments to be accomplished with ease. Sync works seamlessly with Google on calendar; however, my to do list got wiped out when i switched phones, so it does need to be be made more clear whether certain elements are being synced or backed up or not.

I'm a fan! (Better than Google Calendar). I like the view and funtionality of this app and use it on both my phone and my computer (Chromebook). I prefer it over the stock apps and it integrates really well with my Google Account calendars.

I've been using this app for years and loved it. It synced all my calendars and also synced the app I use to schedule clients for my business. I've noticed the last couple of days it's not updating my business appointments, do I have to purchase the pro version for this option to work now or is it a glitch? Uodate: It seems to be an issue with my phone, not sure what exactly , but it takes a long time for it to sync. Thank you for your response.

This calendar out of the box (so to speak) worked perfect for me. I had very little setup to do to serve my purposes. It has all events from my emails, contacts birthdays, notes that I put in, etc. This is better for me than Blik, DigiCal which I actually paid for, and just recently been having issues with sync, dates not showing up, etc. Good job. I will happily be paying for the pro version

I purchased the app 6 months ago. Until I tried it I had never made a purchase on the app store and I haven't made any others to this day. You can save appointment templates which saves tons of time when adding to your calendar in the future. It has customizable widgets, task lists with reminders and priorities and so much more! I have recommended it to all of my friends and family. Whether an on the go cyber schooling mom like me or a anyone else, there is something in this app for everyone.

I'm really picky when it comes to calendar apps, so it took me a long time of trial and error to find one that had everything I wanted. This app is the closest thing to perfection in terms of things I wanted off my checklist. The one thing I really, really wish this app has is the ability to writes notes. That option would be such a game changer for me! Please do this!

I have used Business Calendar for several years now and love it. Things I like especially: 1) I can create and use local calendars. 2) The Favorites Bar makes it easy to toggle visibility of just the calendars I want to see. 3) Backup and import on its own is worth paying for the pro version. Has made moving my calendar from one phone to another so easy. I had tried three other popular calendar apps, but each had compromises. Business Calendar does everything well, and I couldn't be happier.

Been using this app for many years, and each update makes it better. Developers are continually improving it, even with a one-time license purchase (very rare these days). Coordinates well with Google Calendars and phone contacts, and has tremendous flexibility due to its many options. I'm an old PIM user from decades past, which is why Business Calendar was the first app I loaded on a smart phone.

I've used Business Calendar 2 for many years and I absolutely love it! The layout, the color options, and the widgets are spectacular. The only thing I don't like about it is it's not available with iOS. I recently switched to iPhone from Android and I still haven't chosen a calendar for iOS because none of them compare to Business Calendar 2. I lug around my tablet so I can use the calendar.

I have the purchased version. I love that they have more colors. Love that each event can have a reminder which can be customized. I love that different email calendars can be incorporated into 1 calendar. My husband and I both have the same calendar on our phones and each update on the other's phone appears in the calendar. I have had this app for 3 years. So far so good.
Fantastic calendar! Recent updates bring support for Microsoft calendars. Unfortunately, recurring events on Team's calendars are only shown for the upcoming few weeks and not their full duration.

My go-to calendar for YEARS. I love the options, how it let's me put in all the details I need, send invites, color-coded, manage multiple accounts. Only complaint is with location - I think you used to be able to put in the name of where you were going and it would find all that info and save it for you. Now you have to know the exact address. It's not a deal breaker, just a feature I miss.

I love Business Calendar! I love being able to color code my "appointments" (actual appointments, but also many reminders of things to do, plus birthdays, anniversaries, etc). It occasionally asks me to upgrade to the paid Pro version, but I personally do not have any need for the additional options included with the Pro version. I tried a few other calendar apps (including Google's) but I much prefer this one!! Keep up the good work üëå 5 years later & Business Calendar is still the bestüòéü•≥üññ

Good app! Replaced Business Calendar when latest update made day numbers disappear... Don't people check their revisions anymore???

Great Calendar, worthy of 5 stars UNLESS you need to use the Tasks section. I can't have a set task every Monday at 8:45am. I click on every Monday but only the first day shows. Sad. I emailed them and learned that although it only shows the next occurrence, it will update each week. One star upped to 4 stars. When setting up multiple calendars for different types of scheduling work, volunteer work and time with the family, it so much easier to share the individual calendars with those that need to know about those schedules. Though, don't need to see your entire calendar. It makes checking availability easier, from your desktop or your smartphones. Recommended!

I was very close to transitioning to using this app and buying the paid version. The integration with my Google Calendar is great, but Google Tasks is not. The time and other details don't sync, which the devs did clarify is a limitation of Google's API. I appreciate the info density, but the UI just feels cramped, IMO. Great app; would strongly consider again if a web or a cross-platform app is made, or if/when Google lifts their API limitations.

My favorite app. This is the best app I've ever used!!! It just keeps getting better and better. It's like the app reads my mind and anticipates what I want to do. The longer/more I use it, the better it gets at almost anticipating what I want/need to do next. Especially, now with my new Windows 11 laptop, it's even more convenient and helpful + printing is easier. MW

I'm 66 and am so thrilled - as soon as i took a couple of the numerous tutorials Business Calendar offers (free and very accessible) I quickly saw how clear and intuitive this app's design is! This confirmed what so many reviewers had said. I've been using it somewhat constantly for five weeks and i love it. The best calendar app out there, as many users agree. And when i have a question, the answer is found fast. Thank you!

Superb and professional design. Intuitive and innovative. Jam-packed with easy to navigate customizations and with a clean and roomy interface. I can see way more events on each day... No more having to tap the day to see all the events if I have more than 3. On all the other calendar apps you get a little plus button at the bottom... This one can fit a ton more, like 10 maybe. You can customize font size so you see more calendar data. Most legit calendar app.

I have been using business calendar for years, and imo, it's the best there is. The price is more than fair, and upgrades are always an improvement over previous versions. It's obvious that they put a lot of thought into it. Aside from the app being terrific, the customer support is stellar. Anytime I have a question, they respond RIGHT AWAY, and the answers are thorough and beyond helpful. You can tell that they truly care. Thank you Business Calendar!

Update: This is just an update to say I continue to use and love BC2. I have tried other apps but either they lack the features or have expensive subscriptions. Kudos to the developers here! I have been using this app for at least a few years now. I love that I can see my calendar appointments and tasks in a single, integrated view. They also continue to add new features and are quick to respond to questions... All for a very low cost, especially compared to the subscription services.

Don't be fooled by the generic name, this is the best mobile calendar app on the play store. It's extremely customizable and has features like being able to drag and drop events and being able to multiselect events and move them all at once in case something comes up or a meeting runs long. It had lots of little quality of life features like a button to postpone tasks or events until Tomorrow if they are overdue. This app changed my mind about mobile calendars and how they're not all annoying.

I've been using this app for years and it is the best one out there. You can view your busy schedule in different ways, and it's easy to take a quick glance at it to see where you still have openings. I am a hair stylist and I need to spot an available opening quickly. You can search for your customers name to find their past or future appointments, and you can design it to the color schemes of your choice and make quick edits, repeat appointments, add reminders and addresses that link to maps.

Great calendar app! I've used versions of this app for years to keep my jobs, appointments, events, and reminders recorded. Adding info to the events is easy. Color specification is an easy visual way to keep different types of events straight, an rearranging events is as easy as click, drag and release. It's been an inseparable party of my life for quite a while now.

I have used this calendar app on and off since 2014. I recently came back, & I love it. I have 2 personal and 6 work calendars across 2 Google accounts, and this app pulls them all together beautifully; I much prefer the aesthetics of this app over the stock Google calendar app. I have also installed BC2 on my Windows 11 PCs using the Android subsystem for Linux. I need to print copies of my work calendars, & the results from this app on my PC are much better than my previous solution.

I really like how tasks are handled. You can be very descriptive, see them all in one view, and move them to the next day easily. Though l, I did pay the pro price to get recurring tasks. The day view is good too. It's like an agenda, but without the details, it gives a good view of the time you'll be using. The pop-up on the monthly view to see the day and add to it is also convenient. If you sync it to Google Cal, it is a full sync. What you do on one shows on the other.
It is a great calendar, though it is dependent on your original calendar.
It's a good calendar app with decent features.

good calendar app
I find copying or moving appointments to be a little cumbersome, but otherwise it's intuitive, easy to use and at this point I completely rely on it as an essential tool on my phone.

Everything about this is what I want, except I can't turn Holidays completely off. I don't want to see giant color blocks of holidays that get in the way of my events. I want a calendar that I can glance at and see my events easily.
I like this App but would love to change the start of the week to Sunday as it's always been the 1st day of the weeknhere in Australia. Otherwise it's a good App.
I really like the customization features of this app! Been using it for a while and enjoy it because I'm not a "heavy" calendar user but like flexibility. Just wish notifications worked better.
Rough spots, I just want a reliable schedule and record
I'm finding it useful and easy to use. Also any event I create gets automatically updated in Google calendar.
Very common sense. Once installed, it had all my dates and events in there. Effortless.

Love the app and use it as my main calendar and to-do list. Useful for students who operate on an academic calendar, with week 1 usually being somewhere in September.

Great app, but you can only paste a copied event to one date at a time. The navigation area still stays pure black which looks unfinished, and the app icon was clearly designed by a 5 year old. App name also should be one word to save needless text. 5 star potential plus the wearOS companion is excellent. Edit: I see the Dev has provided an unrelated link and my points remain 100% true
